member.summary: Converts Rdx, Rdy coordinates into latitude and longitude coordinates

member.name: M:Project0506.Converter.convertDateTimeConnections
member.summary: Retrieves "DateTime" from all the Connections Objects in the connectionsList and splits the values. Then puts the split values, Time and Date in seperate variables and sets them in the objects connections.

member.name: M:Project0506.CSVReader.readConnections
member.summary: Reads the CSV, splits every line, splits the line a the defined character in "delimiters". Puts every part of the line in a Connections object and adds this object to an ArrayList
